Test Name: Vanillylmandelic Acid (VMA) and Homovanillic Acid (HVA), Random Urine
Purpose: To determine the concentrations of VMA and HVA in random urine specimens to provide consistent and accurate analytical results.
Equipment: High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) or Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) system
